module.name: Asterisk SIP Settings
module.description: Use to configure Various Asterisk SIP Settings in the General section of sip.conf. Also includes an auto-configuration tool to determine NAT settings. The module assumes Asterisk version 1.4 or higher. Some settings may not exist in Asterisk 1.2 and will be ignored by Asterisk.
module.changelog: *13.0.16* TLS Fixes *13.0.15* FREEPBX-11029 FREEPBX-11074 *13.0.14.8* FREEPBX-10945 *13.0.14.7* FREEPBX-10939 *13.0.14.6* FREEPBX-10789 *13.0.14.5* FREEPBX-10439 loop over config files properly *13.0.14.4* FREEPBX-6338 Provide additional options when configuring Fax Passthrough *13.0.14.3* FREEPBX-9961 ignore mising route binary problems, FREEPBX-10176 remove class on add local network *13.0.14.2* FREEPBX-10084 fixes and FREEPBX-9961 some work *13.0.14.1* Fix missing btn class on a button *13.0.14* FREEPBX-9962 grammar, FREEPBX-9961 more error tolerant ip checking *13.0.13* FREEPBX-9956 Cannot change Asterisk SIP setting *13.0.12* Invalid looping *13.0.11* Fix bug introduced in 13.0.9 *13.0.10* FREEPBX-9697 consolidate all javascript to fix bugs and clean up *13.0.9* Better getBinds settings *13.0.8* FREEPBX-9737 Bring values in line with patch for FREEPBX-6518 handle all settings for Asterisk 11.5+ *13.0.7* Fix weird timeouts during apply changes in sip settings *13.0.6* Move to tab navigation *13.0.5* FREEPBX-9697 Asterisk SIP Settings Page issues *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9600 STUN Server List in Tool Tip *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9539 Bind Port clarifications and notifcation additions *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha7* FREEPBX-9487 Audio Codecs Tooltip not Visible *13.0.1alpha6* Move language to custom fields. *13.0.1alpha5* Fix installer *13.0.1alpha4* FREEPBX-9263 fixing general errors *13.0.1alpha3* FREEPBX-8859 Add WSS Support to pjsip transports *13.0.1alpha2* Fix pages not submiting *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes *12.0.9* FREEPBX-8808 Add STUN and TURN server settings *12.0.8* FREEPBX-8561 + Linked bugs, Remove minimums on number fields. *12.0.7* FREEPBX-8240 fields not wide enough to display input *12.0.6* Point people to the right location *12.0.5* FREEPBX-8237 Fix interface parse regexp to make netmask optional *12.0.4* #8061 - Let IP addresses for NAT be inherited properly. *12.0.3* #7971 - Return the 'Detect External IP' button *12.0.2* Fixes the few remaining bugs *12.0.1alpha7* Provide a function that shows pjsip binds *12.0.1alpha6* Fix a non-glaring issue - only enable pjsip when pjsip is available. *12.0.1alpha5* Fix all glaring codec and migrate issues *12.0.1alpha3* Show reload bar when settings change *12.0.1alpha2* Hide PJSIP when disabled or not present in the system *12.0.1alpha1* PJSipsettings and Generalize and breakout the page for sub-navigation *2.11.0.9* update license file *2.11.0.7* rtp.conf cleanup, require this module *2.11.0.6* #6473 - check t38pt_udptl value before setting in sip_general_additional.conf *2.11.0.5* More fixes related to rtpstart and rtpend values *2.11.0.4* Fixes to missing rtpstart and rtpend values. They will always be added now. *2.11.0.3* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.3 *2.11.0.2* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.2 *2.11.0.1* Adds rtp controlled settings (rtpstart,rtpend), re #6397 *2.11.0.0* #6019
